title: Flip down DVD/Monitor and Custom Mount for airbox

posts.content:
Veba 10.2" DVD/ Monitor in a beige colour. I have had 2 laser cut stainless brackets made up so it mounts easily to the airbox (with either self tappers or you can use rivnuts like we did). The player has a very small footprint so looks more integrated than other players. It also has lights which I wired to the dash switch to replace the airbox light. Comes with the remote, all the wiring, the custom brackets and the original manual.
I am looking for £75 plus postage. This cost me about £300 when new
